text: 29 Nov 2024 Tempting New Romance Novels to Fall for this Week Looking for your next great love story? This week’s lineup of new romance novels is filled with swoon-worthy moments, unforgettable characters, and heartwarming plots that will sweep you off your feet. Whether you’re in the mood for fiery passion, sweet connections, or unexpected twists, these fresh picks are sure to ignite your imagination and warm your heart. Dive in and discover your next bookish crush! Dreams That Bind Us (Romancing The Keys Book 3) by Irene Lawless Release Date: November 26 2024 Anna, one of Key West’s top furniture designers, is tormented every night by a man who invades her dreams. James, a billionaire real estate mogul, never expects to be haunted by dreams of a beauty with turquoise eyes. When they meet, they realize their dream lovers are real. And when Anna runs, James becomes obsessed with tracking her down. Buy on Amazon Light Locked (Light Locked Series Book 1) by A.K. Chandler Release Date: October 11 2024 Light Locked is a fantasy romance novel that takes a refreshing twist on familiar themes. With slow burn, enemies to lovers, grumpy sunshine elements, it’s a great fit for fans of Villains and Virtues and From Blood and Ash. Buy on Amazon Fix You (The Irish Rogues Book 3) by Katie Ashley Release Date: November 25 2024 For Raphael Neretti, the plan was simple—forge an alliance through an arranged marriage with another powerful Italian family. But that all changed the night he met Maeve Kavanaugh. She’s everything he never knew he wanted, yet she’s also the one woman he can’t have. Maeve is his greatest temptation, and in the mafia world, temptation can be fatal. Buy on Amazon The Wrong Quarterback (The Wrong Player Series Book 1) by C.R. Jane Release Date: November 22 2024 Then Parker Davis crashed into my life and crumbled my reality. The first time I met the Tennessee star quarterback, something like obsession sparked in his eyes. He’s relentless, charming, and absolutely sure of what he wants. And what he wants…is me. Buy on Amazon I Won’t Be In On Monday (The Annoying Hot Bosses Club Book 3) by J. S. Cooper Release Date: November 21 2024 You may think you’re the handsome prince of the law firm and I’m your dutiful wench, but I’m not here to be your plaything. Yes, you’re handsome-ish. Yes, you’re a partner at the firm. Yes, I’m your ugly duckling assistant. But no, I’m not desperate, and I don’t want you. Buy on Amazon The Party Line by Carolyn Brown Release Date: November 5 2024 A niece’s inheritance comes with family secrets, new romance, and sweet Texas strawberries in a refreshing and warmhearted novel by New York Times bestselling author Carolyn Brown. html:
29 Nov 2024

Tempting New Romance Novels to Fall for this Week

Looking for your next great love story? This week’s lineup of new romance novels is filled with swoon-worthy moments, unforgettable characters, and heartwarming plots that will sweep you off your feet. Whether you’re in the mood for fiery passion, sweet connections, or unexpected twists, these fresh picks are sure to ignite your imagination and warm your heart. Dive in and discover your next bookish crush!

Dreams That Bind Us (Romancing The Keys Book 3)

by Irene Lawless

Release Date: November 26 2024

Anna, one of Key West’s top furniture designers, is tormented every night by a man who invades her dreams. James, a billionaire real estate mogul, never expects to be haunted by dreams of a beauty with turquoise eyes. When they meet, they realize their dream lovers are real. And when Anna runs, James becomes obsessed with tracking her down.

Buy on Amazon

Light Locked (Light Locked Series Book 1)

by A.K. Chandler

Release Date: October 11 2024

Light Locked is a fantasy romance novel that takes a refreshing twist on familiar themes. With slow burn, enemies to lovers, grumpy sunshine elements, it’s a great fit for fans of Villains and Virtues and From Blood and Ash.

Buy on Amazon

Fix You (The Irish Rogues Book 3)

by Katie Ashley

Release Date: November 25 2024

For Raphael Neretti, the plan was simple—forge an alliance through an arranged marriage with another powerful Italian family. But that all changed the night he met Maeve Kavanaugh. She’s everything he never knew he wanted, yet she’s also the one woman he can’t have. Maeve is his greatest temptation, and in the mafia world, temptation can be fatal.

Buy on Amazon

The Wrong Quarterback (The Wrong Player Series Book 1)

by C.R. Jane

Release Date: November 22 2024

Then Parker Davis crashed into my life and crumbled my reality. The first time I met the Tennessee star quarterback, something like obsession sparked in his eyes. He’s relentless, charming, and absolutely sure of what he wants. And what he wants…is me.

Buy on Amazon

I Won’t Be In On Monday (The Annoying Hot Bosses Club Book 3)

by J. S. Cooper

Release Date: November 21 2024

You may think you’re the handsome prince of the law firm and I’m your dutiful wench, but I’m not here to be your plaything. Yes, you’re handsome-ish. Yes, you’re a partner at the firm. Yes, I’m your ugly duckling assistant. But no, I’m not desperate, and I don’t want you.

Buy on Amazon

The Party Line

by Carolyn Brown

Release Date: November 5 2024

A niece’s inheritance comes with family secrets, new romance, and sweet Texas strawberries in a refreshing and warmhearted novel by New York Times bestselling author Carolyn Brown.

Buy on Amazon
